mods.name: Minecraft Forge
mods.description: Minecraft Forge is a modding API used by alot of mods.

mods.name: Applied Energistics 2
mods.description: Applied Energistics 2 is a Minecraft Mod which contains a large amount of new content, mostly centered around the concept of using Energy, and the Transformation of Energy in a unique way.

mods.name: AutoMagy
mods.description: Golems Logistic's Together with quaility of life additions to thaumcraft = Sweet!

mods.name: BiblioCraft
mods.description: BiblioCraft adds fancy storage containers including bookcases, armor stands, potion shelves, regular shelves, tool racks, glass weapon cases, wooden desks and wooden chest labels and now add machines, redstone interactions, and eyeware! New in 1.3: Fancy lamps and golden lanterns. Also Tables and enchanted plates!

mods.name: BiblioWoods Highlands Edition
mods.description: Adds support for 4 varietys of wood from Highlands for 8 of the wooden block in BiblioCraft.

mods.name: BiblioWoods Natura Edition
mods.description: Adds support for 13 varietys of wood from Natura for 8 of the wooden block in BiblioCraft.

mods.name: BiblioWoods Forestry Edition
mods.description: Adds support for 24 varietys of wood from Forestry for 8 of the wooden block in BiblioCraft.

mods.name: Big Reactors
mods.description: Adds large, multiblock power generation machines to Minecraft. Compatible with Redstone Flux (RF) power.  Special thanks: powercrystals, skyboy, King_Lemming, & Calclavia for example code.

mods.name: Botania
mods.description: Botania is a magic tech mod based on nature.

mods.name: Buildcraft
mods.description: Extending Minecraft with pipes, auto-crafting, quarries, engines and much more!

mods.name: Carpenter's Blocks
mods.description: Adds slopes and a variety of vanilla-inspired blocks that support covers, side covers, overlays, dyes and chiseled patterns.

mods.name: Chisel 2
mods.description: Adds a chisel item that lets you carve blocks like cobblestone or sandstone. Adds two new blocks to world generation: marble and limestone, which can be be carved and crafted into many various building materials.

mods.name: Computronics
mods.description: Computronics is a Minecraft mod that adds a set of computer peripherals

mods.name: Doom like Dungeon's
mods.description: Hard Core Dungeons

mods.name: Ender IO
mods.description: Compact conduits, painted things and access to your stuff through an eye of ender.

mods.name: Ender Zoo
mods.description: Ender Io's Mobs and more

mods.name: EnhancedPortals 3
mods.description: EnhancedPortals started out as a mod designed to give you a bit more customization for your Nether portals. You could increase the size, shape, or change it's colour. EnhancedPortals 3 takes this even further by leaving behind the focus of being a fully functional, boring, Nether portal.

mods.name: ExtraCells
mods.description: A Mod that adds 4 new ME Storage Cells and some other cool stuff to AE.

mods.name: Extra Utilities
mods.description: A collection of useful blocks and items

mods.name: Factorization
mods.description: Auto-crafting, ore processing, barrels, and other toys

mods.name: Forestry
mods.description: Bees, Trees, and more

mods.name: Forge MultiPart
mods.description: MultiParts

mods.name: Framez
mods.description: Moving frames with microblock and power support!

mods.name: GalacticraftCore
mods.description: Blast off to the stars. Makes a space base or a space station. Discover new worlds and exicting dungeons.

mods.name: Galacticraft Planets
mods.description: Mars addon for Galacticraft.

mods.name: Gendustry
mods.description: Gendustry

mods.name: Hardcore Ender Expansion
mods.description: Hardcore Ender Expansion offers unique, new content across the End.

mods.name: Hats
mods.description: Adds a bunch of hats, as wells as the ability to add more, into Minecraft

mods.name: HatStand
mods.description: Addon for Hats, a Hat Stand block to display hats.

mods.name: Iron Chests 2
mods.description: Tiered chest from iron to diamond with different sizes

mods.name: IronChestMinecarts
mods.description: Iron chest inside minecrafts !

mods.name: JABBA
mods.description: Just Another Better Barrel Attempt

mods.name: Logistics Pipes
mods.description: Logistics Pipes is an extensive overhaul of the Buildcraft pipe system. It allows for better distribution of items via pipes, more organised stockkeeping and easier automated crafting.

mods.name: malisisdoors
mods.description: Animated,Sliding and Custom doors!

mods.name: MineFactory Reloaded
mods.description: Automate everything!

mods.name: MineTweaker 3
mods.description: MineTweaker is a mod that enables players and server admins to alter recipes.

mods.name: ModTweaker
mods.description: ModTweaker is an addon for MineTweaker 3.

mods.name: MachineMuse's Modular Powersuits
mods.description: A mod which adds modular power armor, power tool, and a tinker table to configure them. Uses UniversalElectricty or IC2 for energy.

mods.name: MrCrayfish Furniture Mod
mods.description: This mod adds in what Minecraft has been missing for years, furniture! It includes over 40 pieces of furniture to decorate your bedroom, kitchen, living room and even your garden!

mods.name: Natura
mods.description: Natura is a mod that aims to spice up the world with interesting worldgen.

mods.name: NotEnoughItems
mods.description: Allows you to quickly and easily look up recipes and uses for any item in Minecraft included modded items. Also allows easy spawning of items and a range of one click utilities.

mods.name: NEI Addons
mods.description: Adds in mod integration into NEI by showing bee breeding information as well as other helpful mod plugins.

mods.name: NEIIntegration
mods.description: Replaces NEI Plugins

mods.name: OpenBlocks
mods.description: OpenBlocks is a random collection of ideas - ideas the community have suggested, or ideas we thought "Why hasn't anyone done that yet?". There is no theme, it's quite random. It's not even just blocks, as the name suggests!

mods.name: Open Computers
mods.description: This mod adds programmable, modular and persistent computers to the game.

mods.name: Pam's Harvestcraft
mods.description: Expanded food system including tons of new crops!

mods.name: PneumaticCraft
mods.description: A technical mod all about pneumatics!

mods.name: Power Converters
mods.description: Take control of your power

mods.name: Pressure Pipes
mods.description: Pressurized Pipes and tanks

mods.name: Primitive Mobs
mods.description: Primitive Mobs is a mod that adds a variety of clever mobs, either fully original, inspired by other game franchises or brought back from outdated mods.

mods.name: Railcraft
mods.description: Redefine your rails

mods.name: Random Things
mods.description: A compilation of different blocks and items.

mods.name: Remain In Motion
mods.description: A reimplementation of Redpower frames, with more flexibility and functionality, and including many new types of frames.

mods.name: Statues
mods.description: Adds player statues and showcases

mods.name: Steve's Carts 2
mods.description: Steve's Carts 2 introduces a modular system where you can build a huge amount of carts(hundreds of millions) by combining the parts you want.

mods.name: Steve's Factory Manager
mods.description: This mod allows you to move items between different inventories (machines and storage blocks) by specifying it using commands in a flow chart like way.

mods.name: Steve's Workshop
mods.description: This mod adds a production table that contains multiple modular crafting tables and/or furnaces.

mods.name: Super Crafting Frame
mods.description: Super Crafting Frame is a simple mod that helps with repetitive crafting tasks during early game.

mods.name: Sync
mods.description: This mod provides clones, or as we like to call it, 'shells'. These shells are basically a new individual, with their own inventory, experience level, and even gamemode.

mods.name: Thaumcraft
mods.description: This is what this mod is all about - drawing magic from physical objects in the form of Essentia and reshaping it to perform miracles.

mods.name: ThaumCraft Gates
mods.description: Adds thaumcraft gates to buildcraft

mods.name: Thaumic Tinkerer
mods.description: An addon to Thaumcraft 4, implementing new content. This mod is a spiritual successor to Elemental Tinkerer. Researches that come from this mod are prefixed by [TT]. Build 24.

mods.name: The Twilight Forest
mods.description: An enchanted forest dimension.

mods.name: Waila
mods.description: WAILA (What Am I Looking At) is a mod that shows you what you are looking at.

mods.name: WailaPlugins
mods.description: Addon for waila

mods.name: Project Blue
mods.description: Addon for project red

mods.name: ProjectRed-Base
mods.description: This mod gives you the tools you need to push redstone to its true potential.

mods.name: ProjectRed-Compat
mods.description: This mod gives you the tools you need to push redstone to its true potential.

mods.name: ProjectRed-Integration
mods.description: This mod gives you the tools you need to push redstone to its true potential.

mods.name: ProjectRed-Lighting
mods.description: This mod gives you the tools you need to push redstone to its true potential.

mods.name: ProjectRed-World
mods.description: This mod gives you the tools you need to push redstone to its true potential.

mods.name: Advanced Solar Panel
mods.description: Advanced Solar Panels + Quantum Generator + Solar helmets

mods.name: Compact Solars
mods.description: Compact your solars into a single block with just as much uhmp

mods.name: IC2Nuclear Control2
mods.description: It gives players the ability to build efficient monitoring and control systems for IndustrialCraft 2 Nuclear Reactors. Items in IC2 Nuclear Control can monitor temperature and conditions of the reactor (as well as other IC2 objects) and respond accordingly, whether by turning off the reactor, or by setting off a Howler Alarm to warn nearby players of their impending doom.

mods.name: IHL Tools & Machines
mods.description: Extended water physics, Sticky resin production branch, Industrial fan and much more

mods.name: IndustrialCraft 2
mods.description: Industrial age themed expansion for Minecraft.

mods.name: GalactiGreg
mods.description: Adds gregs ores to GalactiCraft's Dimensions

mods.name: GraviSuite
mods.description: And now after long years of research we represent you our new development a gravitational suite, based at alien technology.

mods.name: Gregtech
mods.description: One of the biggest mods available. This mod single handedly extends your gameplay experience for days

mods.name: AsieLib
mods.description: Library for Asie mods

mods.name: Baubles
mods.description: Baubles is a small addon mod and api that is intended to be used by other mods to add additional inventory slots to a character

mods.name: BdLib
mods.description: This is a collection of generic code used by bdew's other mods

mods.name: Hats - Files

mods.description: In BR this only serves as a client side mod. It allows the user to see more detailed information on anything invloving hunger

mods.description: Displays the damage you inflict on creatures, as well as current health, name and potion effects.

mods.name: IC2 Backpack HUD
